location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

availabilityZones.Description: Logical zone for Elastic San resource; example: ["1"].

provisioningState.Description: State of the operation on the resource.

baseSizeTiB.Description: Base size of the Elastic San appliance in TiB.

extendedCapacitySizeTiB.Description: Extended size of the Elastic San appliance in TiB.

totalVolumeSizeGiB.Description: Total size of the provisioned Volumes in GiB.

volumeGroupCount.Description: Total number of volume groups in this Elastic San appliance.

totalIops.Description: Total Provisioned IOPS of the Elastic San appliance.

totalMBps.Description: Total Provisioned MBps Elastic San appliance.

totalSizeTiB.Description: Total size of the Elastic San appliance in TB.

privateEndpointConnections.Description: The list of Private Endpoint Connections.

publicNetworkAccess.Description: Allow or disallow public network access to ElasticSan. Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'.

id.Description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.Description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

provisioningState.Description: Provisioning State of Private Endpoint connection resource

groupIds.Description: List of resources private endpoint is mapped

id.Description: The ARM identifier for Private Endpoint

status.Description: Indicates whether the connection has been Approved/Rejected/Removed by the owner of the service.

description.Description: The reason for approval/rejection of the connection.

actionsRequired.Description: A message indicating if changes on the service provider require any updates on the consumer.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

principalId.Description: The principal ID of resource identity.

userAssignedIdentities.Description: Gets or sets a list of key value pairs that describe the set of User Assigned identities that will be used with this volume group. The key is the ARM resource identifier of the identity.

principalId.Description: The principal ID of the identity.

clientId.Description: The client ID of the identity.

provisioningState.Description: State of the operation on the resource.

encryptionProperties.Description: Encryption Properties describing Key Vault and Identity information

networkAcls.Description: A collection of rules governing the accessibility from specific network locations.

privateEndpointConnections.Description: The list of Private Endpoint Connections.

identity.Description: The identity to be used with service-side encryption at rest.

currentVersionedKeyIdentifier.Description: The object identifier of the current versioned Key Vault Key in use.

lastKeyRotationTimestamp.Description: Timestamp of last rotation of the Key Vault Key.

currentVersionedKeyExpirationTimestamp.Description: This is a read only property that represents the expiration time of the current version of the customer managed key used for encryption.

userAssignedIdentity.Description: Resource identifier of the UserAssigned identity to be associated with server-side encryption on the volume group.

virtualNetworkRules.Description: The list of virtual network rules.

id.Description: Resource ID of a subnet, for example: /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{groupName}/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/{vnetName}/subnets/{subnetName}.

action.Description: The action of virtual network rule.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

volumeId.Description: Unique Id of the volume in GUID format

creationData.Description: State of the operation on the resource.

provisioningState.Description: State of the operation on the resource.

createSource.Description: This enumerates the possible sources of a volume creation.

sourceId.Description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

targetIqn.Description: iSCSI Target IQN (iSCSI Qualified Name); example: "iqn.2005-03.org.iscsi:server".

provisioningState.Description: State of the operation on the resource.

status.Description: Operational status of the iSCSI Target.

resourceId.Description: Resource ID of the resource managing the volume, this is a restricted field and can only be set for internal use.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.
Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

creationData.Description: Data used when creating a volume snapshot.

provisioningState.Description: State of the operation on the resource.

volumeName.Description: Source Volume Name of a snapshot

sourceId.Description: Fully qualified resource ID of the volume. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ElasticSan/elasticSans/{elasticSanName}/volumegroups/{volumeGroupName}/volumes/{volumeName}"
